channel.title: Comments on: My domain continues to expand
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Dave interviewed at Google. From the way he described it, they were one step away from wearing flowing white robes, their eyes crackling with eldritch power.
item.content:encoded: Dave interviewed at Google. From the way he described it, they were one step away from wearing flowing white robes, their eyes crackling with eldritch power.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Tiff's Treats delivers gooey fresh-baked chocolate chip cookies!
item.content:encoded: Tiff’s Treats delivers gooey fresh-baked chocolate chip cookies!

item.title: By: Mischa
item.dc:creator: Mischa
item.description:
Ah, but what Drey did not reveal is that Google, in their infinite wisdom, dialed the phone for me.
So I called 1-800-GOOG-411, said "Austin, Texas" and then said "Tiff's Treats," and the magical gnomes at my destination answered the phone.
MMmmm, hive mind and voice recognition.
MDK
item.content:encoded:
Ah, but what Drey did not reveal is that Google, in their infinite wisdom, dialed the phone for me.

So I called 1-800-GOOG-411, said “Austin, Texas” and then said “Tiff’s Treats,” and the magical gnomes at my destination answered the phone.

MMmmm, hive mind and voice recognition.

MDK

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Well, to my apartment complex. I'm sure if someone were trying hard to look for me, it wouldn't matter if they had my address already or not. $15 buys you anyone's street address. Besides, what are they going to do, knock on every door of every building until they found me?
item.content:encoded: Well, to my apartment complex. I’m sure if someone were trying hard to look for me, it wouldn’t matter if they had my address already or not. $15 buys you anyone’s street address. Besides, what are they going to do, knock on every door of every building until they found me?

item.title: By: HPunster
item.dc:creator: HPunster
item.description: You posted a map TO YOUR HOUSE?!? Seriously, Drey, WTF?
item.content:encoded: You posted a map TO YOUR HOUSE?!? Seriously, Drey, WTF?
